# r_type

**Instance Property**

Indicates the type of relocation to be performed. Possible values for this field are shared between this structure and the `relocation_info` data structure; see the description of the `r_type` field in the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/kernel/relocation_info] data structure for more details.

## Declaration

```swift
uint32_t r_type:4;
```
title: r_type
